resources.string: Switch to League of Legends servers!
Check your ping in the touch of a button!
Click on any of the game icons on the navigation bar above, then click on the server that you want to ping.
Click the pencil and paper icon on the navigation bar above to ping specific ip addresses or sites.
Ensure that you are connected to the same wifi network (ethernet/wireless) that you will be using to play/connect.
Both the server lists and the navigation bar are scrollable. You can configure some options in the settings page (gears icon)!

► Ping Statistics for North America
• 3 pings transmitted
• 3 pings received
• 0% packet loss
• min : 30 ms, avg : 85 ms, max : 160 ms
• Full ping results: 52, 62, 176, 25, 71

► Ping Statistics for %1$s
• %2$d pings transmitted
• %3$d pings received
• %4$d%% packet loss
• min : %5$s, avg : %6$s, max : %7$s
• Full ping results: %8$s

Something went wrong while pinging %1$s.
We were unable to ping the host.
This may be due to issues with the host or a bug with the code.

Please check your internet connection or try again, if it still does not work, please report the issue straight to the app creator (check store page for contact details).

WARNING! You are not connected to a wifi network nor a mobile data connection! Ensure that you are connected to a wifi network that you will be playing/connecting to hosts on for the most accurate results. You can turn this warning off in settings

WARNING! You are currently using your mobile data to ping! Ensure that you are connected to a wifi network that you will be playing/connecting to hosts on for the most accurate results. (If you are on a paid plan, data may be used) You can turn this warning off in settings
Tap your screen to close the results!
"The app will do %1$s before posting the ping results."
"Animated backgrounds will be used for each game."
"Animated backgrounds will not be used for each game. Instead, a still image will serve as the background."
"Will display appropriate warnings when pinging on/off wifi connections and mobile connections."
"No warnings will be displayed even if attempting to ping on/off wifi and mobile connections."
"Rate PING! on the Google Play Store"
"If you are enjoying this app, please take a moment to rate this app. It won't take more than a minute. Thank you for your support!"
"If you are enjoying this app, please take a moment to rate this app. It won't take more than a minute. Thank you for your support!"
